TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeNodeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of a TreeNodeConverter. Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>. For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
Docs.returns: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. This can be `null`, so always check. Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>. If null is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
Docs.summary: Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
